column1: * Many Elves heed the summons of Oromë
column2: and passing the Sea of Helcar
column3: begin the Great Journey to Aman. The three clans willing were ever known as the Eldar and they were: the Vanyar led by Ingwë; the Noldor led by Finwë; and the Teleri led by Thingol and Olwë.

column1: * Some Elves - possibly led by Morwë and Nurwë - chose to stay behind and became known as the Avari
column2: the Unwilling. This was the First Sundering of the Elves.
